Description: Measured from 1 to 10, with 10 meaning a country is in the top 10% of countries for happiness
Average of binary responses to the question: “If you were in trouble, do you have relatives or friends you can count on to help you whenever you need them, or not?”
GDP per capita on a log scale
The expected lifetime in years for a country's resident.
Average of binary responses to the question: “Are you satisfied or dissatisfied with your freedom to choose what you do with your life?”
